title: Input schema for the Internshala Scraper

max_results.title: Maximum Results
max_results.description: Maximum number of internships to collect

job_category.title: Job Category
job_category.description: Category of internships to search for (e.g., Software Development, Marketing)

work_from_home.title: Work From Home
work_from_home.description: Search for work from home internships

location.title: Location
location.description: Location for internships (used if work from home is false)

stipend.title: Minimum Stipend
stipend.description: Minimum stipend requirement (leave empty if not applicable)

pages_to_scrape.title: Pages to Scrape
pages_to_scrape.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape
